channel.title: CVE Feed for AccessAlly -- PopupAlly
channel.description: The latest CVEs for AccessAlly -- PopupAlly

item.title: CVE-2024-23520|2024-03-26T11:47:10.447Z -- AccessAlly -- PopupAlly
item.description: Missing Authorization vulnerability in AccessAlly PopupAlly.This issue affects PopupAlly: from n/a through 2.1.0.

item.title: CVE-2024-33639|2024-04-26T07:19:35.051Z -- AccessAlly -- PopupAlly
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in AccessAlly PopupAlly allows Stored XSS.This issue affects PopupAlly: from n/a through 2.1.1.
